name: Safe Zone (Post-Jam)
description:
Post-Jam version of Safe Zone come with bugfixes, musics and sounds, boss, and gameplay adjustments.
Enemies now attack less randomly, and character hitbox is now very small.
Add one boss in middle named "Giant Fly", basically stronger version of "Red Fly" with additional attacks.

Controls:
Space          - [Jump]
Ctrl             - [Fire 1]
Up/Down/W/S  - Aim Up/Down
Left/Right/A/D - Move Left/Right

Use [Fire 1] to shoot bullets

Credits:
Ted Kerr, Spring - Musics
SubspaceAudio   - Sound Effects
